hp.special: 5 + five times your ranger level (the drake has a number of Hit Dice [d10s] equal to your ranger level)

immune.special: determined by the drake's draconic essence trait

trait.name: Draconic Essence
entries: When you summon the drake, choose a damage type: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. The chosen type determines the drake's damage immunity and the damage of its Infused Strikes trait.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@dice 1d6} plus PB piercing damage.

reaction.name: Infused Strikes
entries: When another creature within 30 feet of the drake that it can see hits a target with a weapon attack, the drake infuses the strike with its essence, causing the target to take an extra {@damage 1d6} damage of the type determined by its Draconic Essence.
